title: Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7616 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for small sideboard with Bakelite (?) top, wood body, and four straight, tapered legs. Two drawers near top with two circular pulls each, two cabinets below with circular handles near center. Stretcher around back and sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-923.
